title: sa_nāradasmṛti
body:
<body xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'>
      <div type='part' n='1: mātrikā'>
	<head>1. mātṛkā</head>
	<div type='chapter' n='1: vyavahāraḥ'>
	  <head>1. vyavahāraḥ</head>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.1'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharmaikatānāḥ puruṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadāsan satyavādinaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā na vyavahāro 'bhūn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na dveṣo nāpi matsaraḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#NarS_m1.1'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharma-ekatānāḥ puruṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadāsan satyavādinaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā na vyavahāro 'bhūn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na dveṣo nāpi matsaraḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.2'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>naṣṭe dharme manuṣyeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyavahāraḥ pravartate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>draṣṭā ca vyavahārāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājā daṇḍadharaḥ kṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#NarS_m1.2'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>naṣṭe dharme manuṣyeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyavahāraḥ pravartate</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>draṣṭā ca vyavahārāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājā daṇḍadharaḥ kṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.3'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>likhitaṃ sākṣiṇaś cātra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvau vidhī saṃprakīrtitau</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃdigdhārthaviśuddhyarthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvayor vivadamānayoḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#NarS_m1.3'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>likhitaṃ sākṣiṇaś cātra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvau vidhī saṃprakīrtitau</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃdigdhārthaviśuddhyarthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvayor vivadamānayoḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.4'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sottaro 'nuttaraś caiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa vijñeyo dvilakṣaṇaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sottaro 'bhyadhiko yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vilekhāpūrvakaḥ paṇaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#NarS_m1.4'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sottaro 'nuttaraś caiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa vijñeyo dvilakṣaṇaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sottaro 'bhyadhiko yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vilekhāpūrvakaḥ paṇaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.5'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vivāde sottarapaṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvayor yas tatra hīyate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa paṇaṃ svakṛtaṃ dāpyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vinayaṃ ca parājaye</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#NarS_m1.5'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vivāde sottarapaṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvayor yas tatra hīyate</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa paṇaṃ svakṛtaṃ dāpyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vinayaṃ ca parājaye</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.6'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāras tu vyavahārāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratijñā samudāhṛtā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taddhānau hīyate vādī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taraṃs tām uttaro bhavet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#NarS_m1.6'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāras tu vyavahārāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratijñā samudāhṛtā</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taddhānau hīyate vādī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taraṃs tām uttaro bhavet</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.7'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kulāni śreṇayaś caiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṇāś cādhikṛto nṛpaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratiṣṭhā vyavahārāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gurvebhyas tūttarottaram</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#NarS_m1.7'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kulāni śreṇayaś caiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṇāś cādhikṛto nṛpaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratiṣṭhā vyavahārāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gurvebhyas tūttarottaram</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.8'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa catuṣpāc catuḥsthānaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>catuḥsādhana eva ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caturhitaś caturvyāpī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>catuṣkārī ca kīrtyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#NarS_m1.8'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa catuṣpāc catuḥsthānaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>catuḥsādhana eva ca</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caturhitaś caturvyāpī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>catuṣkārī ca kīrtyate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.9'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṣṭāṅgo 'ṣṭādaśapadaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śataśākhas tathaiva ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>triyonir dvyabhiyogaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvidvāro dvigatis tathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#NarS_m1.9'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṣṭāṅgo 'ṣṭādaśapadaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śataśākhas tatha aiva ca</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>triyonir dvyabhiyogaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvidvāro dvigatis tathā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.10'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharmaś ca vyavahāraś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caritraṃ rājaśāsanam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>catuṣpād vyavahāro 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uttaraḥ pūrvabādhakaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#NarS_m1.10'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharmaś ca vyavahāraś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caritraṃ rājaśāsanam</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>catuṣpād vyavahāro 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uttaraḥ pūrvabādhakaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.11'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra satye sthito dharmo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyavahāras tu sākṣiṣu</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caritraṃ pustakaraṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājājñāyāṃ tu śāsanam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#NarS_m1.11'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra satye sthito dharmo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyavahāras tu sākṣiṣu</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caritraṃ pustakaraṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājājñāyāṃ tu śāsanam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.12'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāmādyupāyasādhyatvāc</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>catuḥsādhana ucyate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caturṇām āśramāṇāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rakṣaṇāt sa caturhitaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#NarS_m1.12'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāmādyupāyasādhyatvāc</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>catuḥsādhana ucyate</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caturṇām āśramāṇāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rakṣaṇāt sa caturhitaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.13'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kartṝn atho sākṣiṇaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sabhyān rājānam eva ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyāpnoti pādaśo yasmāc</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caturvyāpī tataḥ smṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#NarS_m1.13'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kartṝn atho sākṣiṇaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sabhyān rājānam eva ca</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyāpnoti pādaśo yasmāc</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caturvyāpī tataḥ smṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.14'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharmasyārthasya yaśaso</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lokapaktes tathaiva ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caturṇāṃ karaṇād eṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>catuṣkārī prakīrtitaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#NarS_m1.14'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharmasyārthasya yaśaso</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lokapaktes tatha aiva ca</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caturṇāṃ karaṇād eṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>catuṣkārī prakīrtitaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.15'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājā sapuruṣaḥ sabhyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāstraṃ gaṇakalekhakau</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hiraṇyam agnir udakam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṣṭāṅgaḥ sa udāhṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#NarS_m1.15'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājā sapuruṣaḥ sabhyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāstraṃ gaṇakalekhakau</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hiraṇyam agnir udakam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṣṭāṅgaḥ sa udāhṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.16'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṇādānaṃ hy upanidhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhūyotthānam eva ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattasya punar ādānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aśuśrūṣābhyupetya ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#NarS_m1.16'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṇādānaṃ hy upanidhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhūya utthānam eva ca</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattasya punar ādānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aśuśrūṣābhyupetya ca</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.17'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vetanasyānapākarma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathaivāsvāmivikrayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vikrīyāsaṃpradānaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krītvānuśaya eva ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#NarS_m1.17'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vetanasyānapākarma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatha aiva asvāmivikrayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vikrīya asaṃpradānaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krītvānuśaya eva ca</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.18'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samayasyānapākarma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vivādaḥ kṣetrajas tathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>strīpuṃsayoś ca saṃbandho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāyabhāgo 'tha sāhasam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#NarS_m1.18'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samayasyānapākarma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vivādaḥ kṣetrajas tathā</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>strīpuṃsayoś ca saṃbandho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāyabhāgo 'tha sāhasam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.19'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vākpāruṣyaṃ tathaivoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daṇḍapāruṣyam eva ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dyūtaṃ prakīrṇakaṃ caivety</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṣṭādaśapadaḥ smṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#NarS_m1.19'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vākpāruṣyaṃ tatha aiva uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daṇḍapāruṣyam eva ca</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dyūtaṃ prakīrṇakaṃ caiva ity</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṣṭādaśapadaḥ smṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.20'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣām eva prabhedo 'nyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śatam aṣṭottaraṃ smṛtam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kriyābhedān manuṣyāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śataśākho nigadyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#NarS_m1.20'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣām eva prabhedo 'nyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śatam aṣṭa-uttaraṃ smṛtam</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kriyābhedān manuṣyāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śataśākho nigadyate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.21'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāmāt krodhāc ca lobhāc ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tribhyo yasmāt pravartate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>triyoniḥ kīrtyate tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>trayam etad vivādakṛt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#NarS_m1.21'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāmāt krodhāc ca lobhāc ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tribhyo yasmāt pravartate</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>triyoniḥ kīrtyate tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>trayam etad vivādakṛt</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.22'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvyabhiyogas tu vijñeyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaṅkātattvābhiyogataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śaṅkāsatāṃ tu saṃsargāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tattvaṃ hoḍhādidarśanāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#NarS_m1.22'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvyabhiyogas tu vijñeyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaṅkātattvābhiyogataḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śaṅkāsatāṃ tu saṃsargāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tattvaṃ hā uḍhādidarśanāt</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.23'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pakṣadvayābhisaṃbandhād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvidvāraḥ samudāhṛtaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrvavādas tayoḥ pakṣaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratipakṣas taduttaram</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#NarS_m1.23'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pakṣadvayābhisaṃbandhād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvidvāraḥ samudāhṛtaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrvavādas tayoḥ pakṣaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratipakṣas taduttaram</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='NarS_m1.24'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhūtacchalānusāritvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvigatiḥ sa udāhṛtaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhūtaṃ tattvārthasaṃyuktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramādābhihitaṃ chalam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
